resources.string:
This is "The Android Example App in Kotlin". While building your own apps with Contentful, you can reference this app\'s code, found on GitHub.

You can also edit the content in the app by cloning the Contentful space to your own Contentful account by following the instructions here.

This app is also available in the following platforms and languages:
A reference for Android developers using Contentful

Could not find category %s.

To mitigate, please try the following
  • Make sure the content you are trying to access exists and is published.
  • Check if the content model has changed. Did you delete a content type or a required field?
  • Check if the content is in a draft or pending changes state (Content Delivery API), or if it has been deleted (Content Preview API & Content Delivery API).
  • Check if all required fields have content for this locale.
  • Verify that your space id and access tokens are correct and up to date.

Could not fetch any courses.

To mitigate, please try the following
  • Make sure the content you are trying to access exists and is published.
  • Check if the content model has changed. Did you delete a content type or a required field?
  • Check if the content is in a draft or pending changes state (Content Delivery API), or if it has been deleted (Content Preview API & Content Delivery API).
  • Check if all required fields have content for this locale.
  • Verify that your space id and access tokens are correct and up to date.

Could not reach Contentful.

To mitigate, please try to connect to the internet and try again.
Open \"Preview\" for this platform from any of your entries. Scan the resulting QR code here.
Place a qr code inside this rectangle to scan it.
Found qr code content <tt>%s</tt> does not belong to this app. Please try a different QR code.
The logo of the example app.
Select preview from any of your entries in the Contentful Webapp and show the resulting QR code to this app.
Could not fetch locales. Please check parameters …
Reset credentials to default settings, losing all the entered credentials.
